How to cook? No favorites recipes My favorite recipes Version 1.0 App Description Foodie Finder is a mobile application to help you search recipes and to know their nutrition facts. Key Features Search for all types of recipes. Save and create a list of favorites recipes. System Requirements Mobile device running Android. Internet connection to sync data and access online features. Developer Info This app is a demo to showcase my work.
Confirm Deletion Are you sure you want to delete this recipe from your favorites? Yes No Click to cook it
